Plot: A tangled story of three men's lives on the gritty streets of Chicago: Manning, a dirty, disillusioned cop; Julian, king of drugs, thugs and prostitution; and Frank, a ruthless politician who destroys everything in the way of his ambition.
Title: Dirty Work
Writer: Bruce Terris (screenplay), Bruce Terris (story), Rick Rose (story), Jennifer Vincent (story), Rick Rose (screenplay)
Actors: Lance Reddick, Michael McGlone, Nutsa Kukhianidze, Austin Pendleton
